articles.author: Chris Welch
articles.title: Beats announces $149.99 Studio Buds earbuds with active noise cancellation
articles.description: Beats has announced its second pair of true wireless earbuds, the new Beats Studio Buds. They offer active noise cancellation in a design that’s much more compact than the Powerbeats Pro and cheaper than the Apple AirPods Pro.
articles.content:
Preorders open today, and theyll be available on June 24th
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.

articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: Affordable OnePlus N200 5G will go on sale on June 25th
articles.description: The OnePlus N200 5G is a very affordable 5G phone with a 6.5-inch screen and 90Hz refresh rate, 13-megapixel main rear-facing camera, and a big 5,000mAh battery.
articles.content:
It features a big battery and 90Hz display for $239
The OnePlus N200 is one of the least expensive 5G phones to go on sale in the US.
Image: OnePlus

articles.author: Bryan Menegus
articles.title: World’s largest meat supplier grinds to a halt after cyberattack
articles.description: The Brazilian beef and pork supplier has been closing down slaughterhouses and shuttering IT systems following what the White House described as an attack originating from a Russian criminal organization.
articles.content:
The White House believes the attack originated from a criminal organization in Russia
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
